attention_detonators.content: Walked into the room and forgot why? That's not age. That's Error Code: Memory Overflow.
You didn't 'lose your thought.' Your overactive Default Mode Network hijacked your Prefrontal Cortex's RAM. It's a data crash, not a character flaw.

EEAT_firewalls: Leading ADHD researchers like Marty-Dugas & Godbout confirm that working memory deficits are a core neurocognitive impairment in ADHD, not just 'forgetfulness'.
Neuroimaging studies consistently demonstrate inefficient activity in the fronto-parietal network during working memory tasks in individuals with ADHD.
